title: taliyah skin idea: zombie lord
body:
Passive : zombies carry her along the walls on a big piece of bone.

Q : would just be green magic or something

W : would be a gnar zombie

E : would be a lot of zombies with spears

R : would be a wall of zombies!

and the worked ground would just show zombies slightly sticking out of the ground that move!

say vayne stuns them to the taliyah wall the zombies grab

name of skin subject to change.

let me know what you think.
